cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.MM, cs.COM. 

The paper deals with pilot contamination in massive MIMO multi-cell communications, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT) and network infrastructure (cs.NI). The proposed pilot allocation scheme involves reusing pilot sequences among non-adjacent cells, which is a technique commonly used in wireless communication systems (cs.SI). The paper also focuses on linear combining techniques at the base station, which is a topic related to signal processing and machine learning (cs.MM). Finally, the paper discusses the improvement in spectral efficiency, which is a performance metric commonly used in communication systems (cs.COM).
